thread.title: Royal Pirates’ Sooyoon Sounds Like An “Angel” In New Solo Track
thread.title_full: Royal Pirates’ Sooyoon Sounds Like An “Angel” In New Solo Track

author: christinaoh21
title: Royal Pirates’ Sooyoon Sounds Like An “Angel” In New Solo Track
text:
Pin   
On March 14, also known in South Korea as White Day, after teasing his new song a couple of days ago, Royal Pirates’ drummer Sooyoon released his first solo track “Angel.” 
The relaxing track is just as romantic as fellow member Moon Kim’s solo track “Dark Chocolate,” although the two songs are tonally very different. 
Former Royal Pirates member James also showed his support for Sooyoon’s new song through an Instagram live and an Instagram post earlier today. A post shared by James (@jamesjhl) on Mar 13, 2017 at 9:32pm PDT Check out Sooyoon’s new song “Angel” below!
